job_description:
Senior DevOps Engineer

We are seeking a highly committed Senior DevOps Engineer to design, build, and configure applications to meet business process and application requirements.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Work in an Agile, collaborative environment to build, deploy, configure, and maintain systems, including software installations, updates, and core services.
  • Collaborate with development teams to enable a continuous integration environment that sustains high productivity levels and emphasizes defect prevention techniques.
  • Design and implement tools for automated deployment and monitoring of multiple environments.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues in development, test, and production instances.

Required Skill Sets:

  • Excellent problem-solving, debugging, and solution design skills for complex technical problems.
  • Familiarity with operating systems like Linux, Windows, iOS, and Android.
  • Basic understanding of programming/scripting in languages such as Java, Bash, or Python.
  • Interest in, understanding of, or experience with Design Thinking Methodology.
  • Interest in, understanding of, or experience with Agile Development Methodology.
  • Understanding of basic network concepts including TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP, LDAP, DHCP, and Routing/Switching.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Very strong troubleshooting skills.

Candidate Profile:

  • Over 4 years of relevant experience as a DevOps Engineer, with a strong foundation in cloud infrastructure and operational optimization.
  • Proficient in major cloud platforms such as AWS. Expertise in Bare-metal environments is an added advantage.
  • Extensive experience in designing, implementing, and maintaining highly scalable systems, ensuring reliable and efficient system operations under significant load.
  • Expert in developing CI/CD pipelines, containerization technologies (particularly Kubernetes), and other orchestration tools.
  • Demonstrated capability in securing cloud infrastructures against external threats, applying industry best practices for cloud security and compliance.
  • Skilled in setting up and managing cloud monitoring solutions for continuous monitoring and improvement of system performance and reliability.
  • Highly adept at debugging and resolving infrastructure issues, and optimizing resource utilization.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at ajish.prabhakaran@focaloid.com

job_description:
AI Engineer – Internal Tooling & Automation

Location: Kerala (Preference will be given to candidates based in Kerala)

Role Summary

We are looking for a forward-thinking and passionate AI Engineer to join our Internal Tooling and Automation team. This role is a unique blend of software engineering, automation, and applied artificial intelligence. As an AI Engineer, you will play a key part in designing and building tools that empower operations teams, streamline business processes, and deliver seamless customer support experiences. Unlike conventional engineering roles, this position focuses not only on building scalable systems but also on embedding AI and ML intelligence into those systems to maximize efficiency and reduce manual workload.

You will collaborate with multiple stakeholders across operations, technology, and business functions to understand pain points and identify opportunities for automation. From developing AI-enhanced internal applications to integrating SaaS platforms and deploying ML-driven solutions, your contributions will directly improve the productivity of teams and enhance the customer journey. This is a role for someone who enjoys problem-solving, thrives in dynamic environments, and is eager to apply AI in practical, business-critical scenarios.

Key Responsibilities

  • Tool Development & Automation: Design, develop, and maintain internal software tools that incorporate automation features. Leverage AI/ML models to address repetitive workflows and enhance tool intelligence.
  • AI-Driven Solutions: Evaluate business processes to identify opportunities where AI/ML models can be deployed to optimize operations, reduce manual intervention, and increase accuracy.
  • Systems Integration: Build and manage integrations with SaaS platforms such as Hubspot, JIRA, and Zendesk using RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and modern web development practices.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with operations, customer support, and business teams to translate requirements into technical solutions. Provide AI-powered recommendations that improve processes and service delivery.
  • Maintenance & Troubleshooting: Monitor the performance of integrations and automation pipelines, resolving technical issues in a timely manner to ensure minimal business disruption.
  • Documentation: Develop comprehensive documentation for internal tools, integration workflows, and AI/ML models to ensure knowledge sharing and scalability.
  • Continuous Improvement: Research and adopt the latest advancements in AI/ML frameworks, automation practices, and web technologies. Regularly propose enhancements to existing systems and workflows.
  • User Experience Focus: Ensure tools and solutions are intuitive, reliable, and designed to provide maximum ease of use for internal stakeholders.

Knowledge, Skills, and Capabilities

  • Strong background in core web technologies: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Proven expertise in developing APIs (RESTful & GraphQL).
  • Hands-on experience with backend frameworks such as Express.js (Node.js), Django (Python), or Spring Boot (Java).
  • Proficiency in scripting (Python, Bash) for automation, data handling, and workflow optimization.
  • Familiarity with AI/ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch) and knowledge of deploying models in production environments.
  • Understanding of integrating ML solutions into existing business systems and ensuring real-time performance.
  • Excellent problem-solving abilities, with a detail-oriented and analytical approach.
  • Strong collaboration and communication skills with the ability to interact effectively with diverse teams.
  • Capable of handling multiple projects independently and delivering within deadlines.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience working with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud, especially leveraging their AI/ML services.
  • Experience with APIs specific to Hubspot, Zendesk, or JIRA.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, DevOps practices, and ML deployment workflows.
  • Exposure to Natural Language Processing (NLP) for automating text-heavy workflows.
  • Experience in creating dashboards or monitoring tools to track the impact of AI-driven automation.

What We Offer

  • An opportunity to work on challenging and impactful projects where AI is applied to solve real operational problems.
  • A collaborative and supportive work environment that encourages learning, experimentation, and professional growth.
  • Exposure to modern technologies and platforms in AI, ML, automation, and cloud computing.
  • Career growth opportunities, including mentorship, certifications, and chances to lead projects as you progress.
  • A workplace culture that values innovation, ownership, and continuous improvement.

Why Join Us?

This role is perfect for someone who is excited about the potential of AI and automation to transform the way businesses operate. You will directly contribute to building intelligent systems that make a tangible difference to both employees and customers. If you are a problem-solver at heart, driven by curiosity, and eager to push the boundaries of technology, we invite you to join our team.

Note: Preference will be given to candidates from Kerala.

Employment Type: Full-time Experience Level: Mid-Senior Level Work Experience: 4 - 8 Years

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at lavanya.a@arttechgroup.com

job_description:
Senior Analytics Engineer

Location: Remote, India Experience: 5 - 12 Years

Role & Responsibilities:

  • Analyze large datasets related to payment processing, card issuance, and customer transactions to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
  • Use statistical techniques and data mining tools to interpret data and generate actionable insights.
  • Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to visualize data and track key performance indicators (KPIs).
  • Work closely with business units, product managers, and other teams to understand data requirements and business objectives.
  • Provide analytical support to stakeholders by delivering data-driven recommendations and insights.
  • Communicate findings and insights effectively through presentations, reports, and visualizations.
  • Develop, maintain, and optimize data pipelines with a focus on using dbt for data transformations, ensuring clean, reliable, and accessible data for analysis.
  • Ensure the accuracy, completeness, and consistency of data used for analysis.
  • Work with data engineers to implement data validation and cleansing processes to maintain high data quality.
  • Create and maintain scalable data models in Snowflake using dbt, following best practices in chosen modeling technique.

  • Expert knowledge of React.js and associated tools:

  • Experience with Next.js and server-side rendering

Front-End Engineering Practices

AI-First Development Practices

Testing & QA

  • Experience with low-bandwidth UX optimization or mobile-first application development
  • Contributions to open-source projects or developer communities focused on modern web development

Why Join Us

  • Work on a mission-driven product in the digital healthcare space
  • Be part of a team that embraces AI-first development practices
  • Build and ship meaningful features that impact real-world healthcare delivery
  • Enjoy a high-ownership, fast-paced environment with growth opportunities

How to Apply

Send your resume, GitHub/LinkedIn profile, and a short introduction to: jobs@needstreet.com

This role is ideal for someone with deep experience in backend architecture, performance optimization, and modern cloud infrastructure—who’s also excited about the possibilities AI brings to system design, workflow automation, and healthcare intelligence. Must be willing to work in hybrid mode.

Core Backend Skills

Cloud Infrastructure & Performance

About Us

Fresh Mind Ideas (FMI) is a branding, design, and digital marketing agency that helps businesses grow through strategy, creativity, and technology. As an Account Manager, you will be the bridge between our clients and our internal teams, ensuring seamless execution of projects, client satisfaction, and measurable results.

Role Overview

We are looking for a proactive and client-focused Account Manager to handle digital marketing projects end-to-end. You will manage client relationships, coordinate with internal teams (design, content, web, performance marketing), and ensure timely delivery of campaigns with high quality.

Key Responsibilities

Client Relationship Management - Act as the main point of contact for assigned clients. - Understand client goals, challenges, and provide strategic digital marketing solutions. - Build trust, manage expectations, and ensure long-term partnerships.

Project Management - Plan, coordinate, and oversee execution of digital marketing campaigns (SEO, SEM, Social Media, Content, Email, Branding, UI/UX projects). - Ensure deliverables are on time, within scope, and aligned with client objectives. - Track project performance and prepare progress reports.

Team Coordination - Collaborate with internal teams (designers, developers, copywriters, ad specialists) to execute campaigns. - Manage task allocation and timelines. - Ensure smooth communication and problem-solving.

Strategy & Growth - Provide strategic insights and recommendations to clients for better ROI. - Identify opportunities to upsell or cross-sell additional services. - Stay updated with digital marketing trends and bring innovative ideas to campaigns.

What We Offer

  • Opportunity to work with exciting clients across industries (IT, Healthcare, Real Estate, Hospitality, Startups, etc.).
  • A creative, collaborative, and growth-driven work culture.
  • Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
  • Learning and growth opportunities in branding, marketing, and leadership.

Skills & Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or related field.
  • 3+ years of experience in client servicing, account management, or digital marketing project management (agency experience preferred).
  • Strong understanding of digital marketing channels (SEO, Google Ads, Meta Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Social Media, Email Marketing).
  • Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
  • Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
  • Proficiency in project management tools (Asana, Trello, Monday, or equivalent).
  • Ability to analyze reports, KPIs, and translate them into actionable strategies.

How to Apply

Send your resume and portfolio/case studies to careers@freshmindideas.com with the subject line: Application – Account Manager (Digital Marketing Projects).
summary: Seeking a Digital Marketing Account Manager to bridge clients and internal teams. Responsibilities include project management, client relations, and driving campaign success.

Brief Description

We are looking for a proactive & highly skilled Technical Support Engineer to provide exceptional technical support to overseas projects, working in rotational shifts to ensure 24/7 availability. This role involves troubleshooting complex issues across cloud platforms, networking, application architectures, and DevOps toolchains. The ideal candidate should be self-motivated, a collaborator, agile, and a continuous learner.

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide technical support and troubleshoot issues related to cloud platforms and services such as Fargate, ECS, DynamoDB, BigQuery, SNS etc.
  • Understand problems by consuming logs and metrics from various sources using services such as CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Alert Managers, and Splunk etc.
  • Analyze and resolve networking challenges, including load balancers, API gateways, reverse proxies, ingress controllers, and service-to-service communications.
  • Work on issues related to client-server communications, firewalls, and virtual machines.
  • Collaborate with DevOps teams to manage and troubleshoot toolchains like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ingress Controllers etc.
  • Act as the first point of contact for technical queries and escalate issues when necessary.
  • Liaise with development and operations teams to identify root causes and resolve incidents effectively.
  • Document troubleshooting steps, solutions, and maintain a knowledge base for recurring issues.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement best practices for monitoring and incident response.
  • Participate in shift handovers and provide timely updates on ongoing issues.

We are looking for a proactive & highly skilled Technical Support Engineer to provide exceptional technical support to overseas projects, working in rotational shifts to ensure 24/7 availability. This role involves troubleshooting complex issues across cloud platforms, networking, application architectures, and DevOps toolchains. The ideal candidate should be self-motivated, a collaborator, agile, and a continuous learner.

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide technical support and troubleshoot issues related to cloud platforms and services such as Fargate, ECS, DynamoDB, BigQuery, SNS etc.

  • Act as the first point of contact for technical queries and escalate issues when necessary.
  • Liaise with development and operations teams to identify root causes and resolve incidents effectively.
  • Document troubleshooting steps, solutions, and maintain a knowledge base for recurring issues.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement best practices for monitoring and incident response.
  • Participate in shift handovers and provide timely updates on ongoing issues.

Preferred Skills

Cloud Platforms and Services: - Hands-on knowledge working with Fargate and ECS for managing and troubleshooting containerized workloads. - Proficiency with DynamoDB and BigQuery for analyzing data and making decisions based on the analysis. - Hands-on knowledge of SNS for debugging message delivery issues and integration workflows.

Monitoring and Logging Tools: - Proficiency in CloudWatch Logs, Loki, and Splunk for consuming and analyzing logs to identify and resolve issues. - Hands-on knowledge with Prometheus and Grafana for analyzing metrics using dashboards and monitoring system health. - Knowledge of Alert Manager for configuring and managing alert escalation. - Ability to interpret metrics from various sources and create actionable insights.

Networking and Security: - Understanding of load balancers (e.g., ALB, NLB) for distributing traffic and troubleshooting connectivity issues. - Knowledge in API Gateways like AWS API Gateway or NGINX for managing API traffic. - Knowledge of reverse proxies and ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX Ingress, Traefik) for managing internal/external traffic. - Understanding service-to-service communications, including DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, and gRPC protocols. - Hands-on knowledge with firewalls, security groups, and IAM roles for secure communications. - Troubleshooting skills for VM-related issues in platforms like AWS EC2 or equivalent.

DevOps Toolchains: - Proficiency with Docker for managing container images and runtime debugging. - Understanding of Kubernetes concepts of managing deployments, ingress setups, and pod-related issues, and related troubleshooting commands and mechanisms. - Knowledge of CI/CD pipeline building tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD for building, deploying, and managing automated pipelines. - Understanding of Ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX, Traefik) and SSL termination for secure routing.

Troubleshooting and Incident Management: - Strong problem-solving skills to identify root causes using logs, metrics, and system-level debugging. - Ability to document detailed troubleshooting steps and solutions for recurring issues.

Collaboration and Communication: - Ability to work with cross-functional teams (DevOps, development, and operations) to resolve incidents. - Skills in effective and proactive communication to escalate issues and provide updates during shift handovers. - Proficiency with tools like Slack, JIRA, Confluence, or Google Workspace for collaboration and issue tracking.

Working closely with the production manager or production supervisor, the Production Coordinator ensures that production schedules are followed, resources are allocated efficiently, and communication flows smoothly between different departments. Role Overview

We are seeking a Product Manager to own the development and delivery of impactful product features that enhance user experience and drive business growth. You will collaborate closely with engineering, design, and data teams to rapidly transform innovative ideas into market-ready solutions.

Key Responsibilities

  • End-to-End Product Ownership: Drive product features from ideation to launch, ensuring alignment with business goals and delivery of high-quality outcomes.
  • Data-Driven Decision Making: Leverage analytics and user feedback to identify opportunities and implement impactful product enhancements.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with engineering, design, and data teams to deliver seamless, timely product releases.

Preferred Skills

  • Experience: 3–7 years of experience in product management.
  • Product Strategy & Roadmapping: Defining a clear vision, goals, and long-term plan for a product, and translating them into a prioritized roadmap that guides development and release.
  • Data-Driven Decision Making: Using quantitative and qualitative data to inform choices, validate assumptions, and measure product performance for better business outcomes.
  • User-Centric Design Thinking: Applying a creative, iterative problem-solving approach focused on understanding user needs and delivering solutions that enhance their experience.
  • Stakeholder Management: Building and maintaining positive relationships with individuals or groups who have an interest in the product, ensuring alignment and effective communication.
  • Agile Product Development: Using flexible, iterative methods to develop and deliver product features quickly, adapting to feedback and changing requirements.
  • Market & Competitive Analysis: Researching industry trends, customer behavior, and competitor offerings to identify opportunities and threats for product positioning.
  • A/B Testing & Experimentation: Comparing two or more variations of a product element with real users to determine which performs best.
  • Go-To-Market Execution: Planning and carrying out the strategies needed to launch a product successfully, including positioning, messaging, and channel selection.
  • Wireframing & Prototyping: Creating visual blueprints and interactive mockups of a product to test concepts and guide development before final build.
  • User Research: Collecting and analyzing feedback, observations, and data from real users to understand their behaviors, needs, and motivations.
  • Education: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or an MBA from a Tier 1 institute.
  • Track Record: Proven track record of launching successful user-facing products.

  • Clear pathways for career growth in a rapidly scaling technology company.
